## Type of Change

- [ ] `feat:` New feature
- [ ] `fix:` Bug fix
- [ ] `docs:` Documentation
- [ ] `refactor:` Code restructuring
- [ ] `test:` Tests
- [ ] `chore:` Maintenance

## Checklist

- [ ] Tests pass locally (`pytest tests/ -m "not expensive"`)
- [ ] No hardcoded secrets or URLs
- [ ] Input validation on new endpoints
- [ ] Documentation updated (CHANGELOG.md, QUICK_REFERENCE.md)
- [ ] No debug statements (console.log, print) in production code
